turns.en: You’re making a phone call. Ask for the person/department and confirm details.
turns.zh: 你在打電話。先找對人/部門，再確認細節。

turns.hint_en: Hi, may I speak to customer service, please?

turns.en: This is customer service. How can I help?
turns.zh: 這裡是客服，請問需要什麼協助？

turns.hint_en: My SIM stopped working. Could you help me troubleshoot?

turns.en: Sure. What phone model are you using?
turns.zh: 可以。你用什麼手機型號？

turns.hint_en: I’m on Android—Samsung S22. Does the troubleshooting differ?

turns.en: Slightly. First, toggle airplane mode on and off.
turns.zh: 有點不同。先把飛航模式開關一次。

turns.hint_en: Got it. After toggling airplane mode, should I check APN settings?

turns.en: Yes. I can text you the correct APN settings.
turns.zh: 對。我可以把正確 APN 用簡訊發給你。

turns.hint_en: Please text me the APN settings. And will that fix data and calls?

turns.en: It should fix data; calls usually work after a restart.
turns.zh: 應該能修好數據；通話通常重開機後恢復。

turns.hint_en: So APN mainly fixes data, and calls may need a restart, right?
